text: The JSB World (styled THE JSB WORLD) is a greatest hits album by Japanese pop boy-band Sandaime J Soul Brothers. It was released on March 29, 2017. It was number-one on the Oricon Weekly Albums Chart on its release, selling 356,772 copies. It was also number-one on the Billboard Japan Weekly Top Albums Sales Chart. By the end of 2017 the album had sold a total of 467,005 copies. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2017) !Peak position |- |Japan Oricon Weekly Albums Chart | align="center" | 1 |- |Japan Billboard Weekly Top Albums Sales Chart | align="center" | 1 |- |Japan Billboard Weekly Hot Albums | align="center" | 1 |- |} ==References== Category:2016 greatest hits albums Category:Japanese-language albums
title: The JSB World
